title: Reduce Plastic Use
description: Bring reusable bags, bottles, and containers to reduce single-use plastic waste.

title: Save Energy
description: Turn off lights and unplug devices when not in use to conserve electricity.

title: Conserve Water
description: Fix leaks and take shorter showers to reduce water consumption.

title: Use Public Transport
description: Choose buses, trains, or carpooling to reduce carbon emissions.

title: Eat Plant-Based
description: Incorporate more plant-based meals to reduce your carbon footprint.

title: Recycle Properly
description: Sort your waste and recycle paper, plastic, glass, and metal correctly.

title: Support Local
description: Buy local produce to reduce transportation emissions and support your community.

title: Plant Trees
description: Plant native trees and plants to improve air quality and support biodiversity.

title: Compost Organic Waste
description: Turn food scraps into nutrient-rich compost for your garden.

title: Choose Renewable Energy
description: Switch to solar or wind energy providers when possible.
